name: Mortui: Outbreak Secrets
description:
Hic Mortui Viventes Educant!

Here the Dead Educate the Living



For some unknown reason, the zombie virus has taken over the world and zombies are everywhere. The question is the pandemic staged? There was always a suspicion about this subject... While running away from the zombies, you found a manhole and jumped in, kept yourself safe in the sewer system. There are enough items in the sewer to sustain your life. But this sewer is going somewhere, deep.... As you wander through, you will find the truth of pandemic and mysteries.

You need to find a way

  • Wander through the sewers system and go deeper.
  • Use the tools and machine parts to solve your way.
  • Be prepared for the flesh thirsty ZOMBIES!
  • Go hard or stealth?! You can fight your way with gun and knife or walk past zombies silently.
  • Cool PSX Era graphics and gameplay with modern gameplay touches.
  • FLASHLIGHT! You need to stack some batteries for the dark parts of the sewers.
  • Oldschool inventory system with animations.
  • Inspired from Resident Evil 1 and Silent Hill 1
